name: interzone
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
between different zones (= areas that a place has been divided into): Students may become eligible for interzone transfers in August. Her greatest victory came in the inter-zone final against Australia. Synonym
interzonal
More examplesFewer examplesThere is considerable inter-zone variation in the types of industry.He won his singles match on the third day of the interzone finals.
a space that exists between two areas that each have special characteristics: the interzone between the town and the sea I was working in the interzone between human geography and physical geography.
More examplesFewer examplesI felt that I was walking into a strange interzone.
